definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate

sentences.english: After the emergence of jigging machine and shaker, so that the application of relatively less chute.
sentences.chinese: 以後出現了跳汰機和搖牀，使溜槽的應用相對減少。

sentences.english: The results of the research work about the characteristics of the flowingfilm in the slime sluice by the authors are presented here.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述有關礦泥溜槽流膜特性的研究結果。

sentences.english: Also briefly described is the newly developed sluice fine screen.
sentences.chinese: 對新研製的溜槽細篩設備作了簡單介紹。

sentences.english: The paper mainly describes the application results of the revolving spiral sluices in the production of several mines.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要闡述旋轉溜槽在幾個礦山工業中應用的效果。

sentences.english: Trouble shooting and analysis of distributing chute on BF of Liuzhou Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 柳鋼高爐布料溜槽脫落引發爐涼事故處理與分析。

sentences.english: Trough the following set up with support to make it solid.
sentences.chinese: 溜槽下面用支撐架起，使之牢固。

sentences.english: Water cooling and sealing technique is used for the gear-box of distributor.
sentences.chinese: 布料器採用水冷水封式傳動箱和多環布料溜槽。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
to feed (a machine)/foreign goods (abbr. of 進口資料|进口资料)
